XXganphrdu:2_0: evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma /
XXganphrdu:2_1: gṛdhrakūṭaparvate mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdham ardhatrayodaśabhir bhikṣuśataiḥ saṃbahulaiś ca bodhisatvair mahāsatvaiḥ /
XXganphrdu:2_2: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate sma /
XXganphrdu:3_0: yaḥ kaścit kulaputra ānanda imāni gaṇapatihṛdayāni dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati tasya sarvāṇi kāryasiddhāni bhaviṣyanti /
XXganphrdu:4_1: oṃ gaḥ gaḥ gaḥ gaḥ gaḥ gaḥ gaḥ gaḥ /
XXganphrdu:4_6_0: oṃ kaṭa kaṭa maṭa maṭa dara dara vidara vidara hana hana gṛhṇa gṛhṇa dhāva dhāva
XXganphrdu:4_6_1: bhañja bhañja jambha jambha tambha (Gph_11) tambha stambha stambha moha moha deha
XXganphrdu:4_6_2: deha dadāpaya dadāpaya dhanasiddhi me prayaccha /
XXganphrdu:4_11: oṃ gaḥ gaḥ gaḥ gaḥ gaḥ gaḥ gaḥ gaḥ /
XXganphrdu:4_16: oṃ suru suru svāhā / oṃ turu turu svāhā / oṃ muru muru svāhā /
XXganphrdu:6_0: yaḥ kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bhikṣur vā bhikṣuṇī vā upāsako vā upāsikā vā /
XXganphrdu:6_1_0: yaḥ kaścit kāryam ālabhate mantrasādhanaṃ vā triratnapūjaṃ vā deśāntaragamanaṃ vā
XXganphrdu:6_1_1: rājakulagamanaṃ vā antardhānaṃ vā tena buddhabhagavatāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā āryagaṇapatihṛdayaṃ
XXganphrdu:6_1_2: saptavārānucārayitavyaṃ sarvakāryāṇi tasya sidhyante nātra śaṃsayaḥ /
XXganphrdu:6_3: dinedine kalpam utthāya sarvasaptavārānucārayitavyaṃ mahāsaubhāge bhaviṣyati /
XXganphrdu:6_5: śrutidharo bhaviṣyati / na cāsya kāye mahāvyādhayo bhaviṣyanti /
XXganphrdu:6_6: na kaścid eva tārapradakṣiṇo 'vatāraṃ lapsyate bhṛṅgo 'vatāraṃ lapsyati na cāsya bodhicittottarāyā bhaviṣyanti /
XXganphrdu:7_0: idam avocat bhagavān āttamanās te ca bhikṣavas te bodhisatvā mahāsatvāḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragaruḍagandharvaś ca loko bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandann iti /
